Title: The Physician
Writer: Noah Gordon (based on the novel by), Jan Berger (screenplay by), Philipp Stölzl, Simon Block, Christoph Müller
Actors: Tom Payne, Stellan Skarsgård, Olivier Martinez, Emma Rigby
Plot: In Persia in the 11th Century, a surgeon's apprentice disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.
